TopicTitle: [WIP] Nova's Plernets, a Kopernicus mod dev thread- Stockalike GP2 and GP3!

Articles.Content:
Great! Now we need moons. And bad mspaint diagrams.

Fluff:

Mostly featureless, completely white, one big mimas like crater.

Squash:

Big band of ice at equator, otherwise Gilly like brown

Bunt:

The king of bad mspaint diagrams . I still don't know what shade of orange it will be, either. That bright thing is not stockalike.

Got it.

So far, I've created the textures for Bunt and Fluff. When I'm finished with Squash's, I'll upload it to MEGA and PM the link to you.
Well, I really want to see your textures, but... um... I can't get Fluff to work.

Okay... I'll send you new ones for Fluff and Squash, 'cuz they're kinda, sorta, CRAPPY.

Also Bunt, cuz DDS is invisible unless you have DDSViewer, and it takes up more memory.

- - - Updated - - -

Here you go!

https://mega.co.nz/#!OhtQRThY!rg5R1gMCCa65szXRizVAqz-gfTVgTBCrrpUNWkWg1Mk

Edited June 15, 2015 by Interplanet Janet
Can I have a beta?
Sorry Augustus, but he hasn't released it yet. However, if you want to, you can help work on this with me and Long.

Okay... I'll send you new ones for Fluff and Squash, 'cuz they're kinda, sorta, CRAPPY.

Also Bunt, cuz DDS is invisible unless you have DDSViewer, and it takes up more memory.

- - - Updated - - -

Here you go!

https://mega.co.nz/#!OhtQRThY!rg5R1gMCCa65szXRizVAqz-gfTVgTBCrrpUNWkWg1Mk

I like the old ones better, there a bit more stockalike. They still lack detail, though. I might try making my own textures for these.

I also re-did the rings, since I figured out how to. Your bump maps and normal maps for Fluff and Squash are staying.

I even moved Eeloo and I can't get Fluff to work.

Beauty shot with new rings:

Tracking station pic as of now, will update the OP

Beauty shot #2:

One of many tries to make fluff work

Edited June 15, 2015 by ThatGuyWithALongUsername
forgot to close spoiler tag

Hope Fluff works sometime in the future; I'd like a preliminary release to try and fix it.

Also, about Bunt... are you changing that texture?

Edited June 15, 2015 by Interplanet Janet

Yes, it's not stockalike enough. I imagined Bunt to be totally different. And I do kinda like the direction of the first two on the original edit.

- - - Updated - - -

I'm not giving beta stuff to anyone yet. I'm the only developer (unless you count Janet, and his textures), so nope. However, if you can help, Augustus, please do. You have a good notion of stockalike design.

Oh, I see.

Also, would it be okay if I made the Thread for the Mod after Alpha 1 is released?

Edited June 15, 2015 by Interplanet Janet
I could probably help with this. Give me all the files and I should be able to figure all this out and make some improvements.

No, but you don't make release threads until the mod is fully released, right? That's how I'm probably gonna do it.

Can anyone tell me why this config for Fluff doesn't work and how to fix it? I did edit the example from Kopernicus.

@Kopernicus:AFTER[Kopernicus]{
    Body
    {
        name = Fluff
        flightGlobalsIndex = 21


        Orbit
        {
            referenceBody = Meander
            inclination = 0
            eccentricity = 0
            semiMajorAxis = 10000000
            longitudeOfAscendingNode = 0
            argumentOfPeriapsis = 0
            meanAnomalyAtEpoch = 0
            epoch = 0
            color = 1,1,1,1
        }


        Properties
        {
            description = Fluffy
            radius = 1000
            geeASL = 0.01
            mass = 1.2420512e+17
            rotationPeriod = 88642.6848
            rotates = true
            tidallyLocked = false
            initialRotation = 0
            isHomeWorld = false
            timewarpAltitudeLimits = 0 500 500 1000 1500 3000 6000 8000




            ScienceValues
            {
                landedDataValue = 8
                splashedDataValue = 1
                flyingLowDataValue = 5
                flyingHighDataValue = 5
                inSpaceLowDataValue = 7
                inSpaceHighDataValue = 5
                recoveryValue = 5
                flyingAltitudeThreshold = 250
                spaceAltitudeThreshold = 500
            }
        }


        ScaledVersion
        {
            type = Vacuum
            fadeStart = 0
            fadeEnd = 0

	    Material
            {
                texture = GasPlanet2/Textures/Fluff_Color
                normals = GasPlanet2/Textures/Fluff_Normal
                shininess = 0
                specular = 0,0,0,1
	    }


        }


        Atmosphere
        {
            // effectively the ambient lighting color for all objects on the ground of this body (provides a slight tint)
            ambientColor = 0.306,0.187,0.235,0


            //
            // shader.invWaveLength = Color( 1 / r^4, 1 / g^4, 1 / b^4, 0.5);
            //
            lightColor = 0.509,0.588,0.643,0


            // General atmosphere settings
            enabled = false
            oxygen = false
            altitude = 0



		temperatureCurve
		{
			key = 	0		221.2	0		-0.0009
			key = 	2000	219.4	-0.0009	-0.0009
			key = 	4000	217.6	-0.0009	-0.0009
			key = 	6000	215.8	-0.0009	-0.0009
			key = 	8000	214		-0.0009	-0.0009
			key = 	10000	212.2	-0.0009	-0.0009
			key = 	12000	210.4	-0.0009	-0.0009
			key = 	14000	208.6	-0.0009	-0.0009
			key = 	16000	206.8	-0.0009	-0.0009
			key = 	18000	205		-0.0009	-0.00167
			key = 	20000	201.66	-0.00167	-0.00167
			key = 	22000	198.32	-0.00167	-0.00167
			key = 	24000	194.98	-0.00167	-0.00167
			key = 	26000	191.64	-0.00167	-0.00167
			key = 	28000	188.3	-0.00167	-0.00133
			key = 	30000	185.64	-0.00133	-0.00133
			key = 	32000	182.98	-0.00133	-0.00133
			key = 	34000	180.32	-0.00133	-0.00133
			key = 	36000	177.66	-0.00133	-0.00133
			key = 	38000	175		-0.00133	-0.00126
			key = 	40000	172.48	-0.00126	-0.00126
			key = 	42000	169.96	-0.00126	-0.00126
			key = 	44000	167.44	-0.00126	-0.00126
			key = 	46000	164.92	-0.00126	-0.00126
			key = 	48000	162.4	-0.00126	-0.00102
			key = 	50000	160.36	-0.00102	-0.00102
			key = 	52000	158.32	-0.00102	-0.00102
			key = 	54000	156.28	-0.00102	-0.00102
			key = 	55000	273.15	0.00103		0
		}


        }


        PQS
        {
            maxQuadLengthsPerFrame = 0.03
            minLevel = 2
            maxLevel = 12
            minDetailDistance = 8


            // Custom PQS material
            materialType = VacuumOptimized
            Material
            {
                saturation = 1
                contrast = 3
                tintColor = 1.000,1.000,1.000,0.000


                powerNear = 0.6
                powerFar = 0.2


                groundTexStart = 0
                groundTexEnd = 1000


                steepPower = 2
                steepTexStart = 0
                steepTexEnd = 50000
                steepTex = BUILTIN/terrain_rock00
                steepBumpMap = BUILTIN/RockyGround2
                steepNearTiling = 8000
                steepTiling = 500


                lowTex = BUILTIN/SandyGround
                lowBumpMap = BUILTIN/quiet
                lowNearTiling = 2000
                lowMultiFactor = 10
                lowBumpNearTiling = 2000
                lowBumpFarTiling = 10


                midTex = BUILTIN/terrain_sand00
                midBumpMap = BUILTIN/SandyGround
                midNearTiling = 4000
                midMultiFactor = 10
                midBumpNearTiling = 8000
                midBumpFarTiling = 10


                highTex = BUILTIN/RockyGround
                highBumpMap = BUILTIN/quiet
                highNearTiling = 4000
                highMultiFactor = 10
                highBumpNearTiling = 4000
                highBumpFarTiling = 10


                lowStart = 0
                lowEnd = 0.3
                highStart = 0.8
                highEnd = 1


                globalDensity = -5E-06
                fogColorRamp = BUILTIN/desert_atmogradient
            }


            Mods
            {
                VertexColorMap
                {
                    map = GasPlanet2/Textures/Fluff_Color
                    order = 500
                    enabled = true
                }
                VertexHeightMap
                {
                    map = GasPlanet2/Textures/Fluff_Height
                    offset = -1000.0
                    deformity = 10000.0
                    scaleDeformityByRadius = false
                    order = 20
                    enabled = true
                }
                VertexSimplexHeight
                {
                    seed = 670000
                    deformity = 1700.0
                    octaves = 12.0
                    persistence = 0.5
                    frequency = 4.0
                    enabled = true
                    order = 21
                }


                VertexSimplexNoiseColor
                {
                    seed = 45
                    blend = 1.0
                    colorStart = 0.768656731,0.6996614,0.653089464,1
                    colorEnd = 0,0,0,1
                    octaves = 12.0
                    persistence = 0.5
                    frequency = 2.0
                    enabled = true
                    order = 200
                }


                HeightColorMap
                {
                    blend = 0.7
                    order = 201
                    enabled = true
                    LandClasses
                    {
                        Class
                        {
                            name = AbyPl
                            altitudeStart = 0.0
                            altitudeEnd = 0.5
                            color = 0.0,0.0,0.0,1.0
                            lerpToNext = true
                        }
                        Class
                        {
                            name = Beach
                            altitudeStart = 0.5
                            altitudeEnd = 0.55
                            color = 0.164179087,0.164179087,0.164179087,1.0
                            lerpToNext = true
                        }
                        Class
                        {
                            name = Beach2
                            altitudeStart = 0.55
                            altitudeEnd = 1.0
                            color = 0.373134315,0.373134315,0.373134315,1.0
                            lerpToNext = false
                        }
                    }
                }


			VertexHeightNoise
			{
				noiseType = RiggedMultifractal
				deformity = 1000.0
				seed = 5906
				frequency = 2.0
				lacunarity = 2.5
				persistance = 0.5
				octaves = 4
				mode = Low
				enabled = true
				order = 22
			}


			VertexSimplexHeightAbsolute
			{
				seed = 4234
				deformity = 400
				octaves = 6.0
				persistence = 0.5
				frequency = 18.0
				enabled = true
				order = 30
			}


			AltitudeAlpha
			{
				atmosphereDepth = 4000.0
				invert = false
				enabled = false
				order = 999999999
			}


			AerialPerspectiveMaterial
			{
				globalDensity = -0.00001
				heightFalloff = 6.75
				atmosphereDepth = 150000
				DEBUG_SetEveryFrame = true
				cameraAlt = 0
				cameraAtmosAlt = 0
				heightDensAtViewer = 0
				enabled = true
				order = 100
			}


			FlattenOcean
			{
				oceanRadius = 1.0
				enabled = false
				order = 25
			}
		}
    }
}

- - - Updated - - -

Sorry Augustus, I wasn't saying no to you, lease help out...

No, but you don't make release threads until the mod is fully released, right? That's how I'm probably gonna do it.

Sorry Augustus, I wasn't saying no to you, lease help out...

Adding a template (Do Moho) should fix it.

Also remove the atmo and temp curve.

And to think we don't get preliminary mods yet.

If you send us some, I'll make a little "tweak" to Fluff.

Ok, when I have time, I'll update the OP, make Fluff work, add contributors to the OP, and give the contributors a dev copy. Sorry, I'm new at modding, and mod management.

there isn't a VacuumOptimised setting in teh game, change it to something thats actually in the game and it'll work

oh and those biomes are from the template, it'll use the template's biome map, so don't get too excited
